item.title: ‘Weapons’ Star Austin Abrams Talks the Wild Ending, ‘Willow’ and Why He Pities His Tragicomic Character
item.description: The rising star, who will lead filmmaker Zach Cregger’s ‘Resident Evil’ movie, also discusses how his time on set with Josh Brolin impacted their upcoming feature ‘Whalefall.’

item.title: Zach Cregger Says His ‘Resident Evil’ Movie Exists ‘Outside’ of the Original Characters Because Fans ‘Already Have That’ With the Games: ‘I’m Not Going to Tell Leon’s Story’
item.description: Zach Cregger remains adamant about not remaking any story within the “Resident Evil” saga for his big-screen adaptation. Although he wants to have an original plot, the “Weapons” director told Inverse
